title: Bug 10403 - Project creation should confirm the bin directory can be scrubbed
OB: When creating a new project for an existing directory structure and specifying the output directory as a bin directory, there is no confirmation or check if the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Specify the output directory as a bin directory which contains more than just .class files. 
3. Confirm that there is no prompt or check to verify if the bin directory can be deleted and rebuilt.
